title: Sian Xiao
text:
Sian Xiao is currently a PhD student in Southern Methodist University advised by Dr. Peng Tao from fall 2020.
He is working on the combination of computational structural biology and modern machine learning techniques. His research topic covers protein allostery, protein conformation exploration, and drug desgin.
He is a soccer fan. He also loves traveling and working out.
